metadata.title: CVE-2019-7573 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 1.2.15 and 2.x through 2.0.9 has aheap-based buffer over-read in InitMS_ADPCM in audio/SDL_wave.c (inside thewNumCoef loop).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7573` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl1.2debian - 1.2.15+dfsg1-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsdl1.2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.15+dfsg1-3ubuntu0.1').
libsdl2 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
